ARABIC: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ مُّحِيطًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: What is in the heavens and in the earth belongs to Allah. Allah encompasses all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And all that is in the heavens and the earth belongs to God; and everything is well within the compass of God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Whatever is in the heavens and in the earth belongs to Allah; Allah en-compasses everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: To God belongs all that is in the heavens and the earth and He has control over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And to Allah only belongs all whatever is in the heavens and all whatever is in the earth; and Allah has control over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And to Allah belongs all that is in the heavens and all that is in the earth. And Allah is Ever Encompassing all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth is Allah's; and Allah encompasses all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: To God belongs all that is in the heavens and in the earth, and God encompasses everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Unto Allah belongeth whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is in the earth. Allah ever surroundeth all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: To God belongs all that the heavens and earth contain. God has knowledge of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Allah's is whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is in the earth; and of everything Allah is ever an Encompasser.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: To Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth, and Allah comprehends all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But to Allah belong all things in the heavens and on earth: And He it is that Encompasseth all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And to Allah belongs all that is in the heavens and all that is in the earth. And Allah is Ever Encompassing all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: To Allah belongs all that is in the heavens and the earth. Allah encompasses everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: To God belongs what is in the heavens and what is on earth, and God encompasses everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And ever is Allah, of all things, encompassing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [4:126] To God belongs all that is in the heavens and in the earth, as possessions, creatures and servants; and God is ever the Encompasser of all things, in knowledge and power, that is, He is ever possessed of such attributes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Unto Allah belongeth whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is in the earth) of created beings and marvels: they are all his bondsmen and bondswomen. (Allah ever surroundeth) has the knowledge of (all things) in relation to the dwellers of the heavens and the earth.
